m_szDocTitle: Air Liquide's Hartford hydrogen depot looms | HartfordBusiness.com
m_szDocSumamry: Air Liquide's Hartford hydrogen depot looms HBJ photo | gregory seay Steelworkers erect the second of two pump-island canopies for Pride Convenience Inc.'s Hartford Travel Center, off Jennings and Leibert roads, in the North Meadows. Related Content Gregory Seay French industrial-gas supplier Air Liquide formally announced Thursday that Hartford is one of four Northeast cities that initially will house its network of hydrogen-refueling stations. It plans to eventually have 12 in the region. As previously reported , Massachusetts retailer Pride Convenience Stores Inc. disclosed in February that
